credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Fairytale Village
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Cup rounded, tapering at base to raised foot; loop handle; painted with band of architectural motifs consisting of houses, churches, etc. Saucer round, with slightly raised rim; painted with a border of pink flower blossoms against a spiral-patterned background.
name: Cup and saucer
